data.title: U.S. Spot Bitcoin ETF Inflows Surge 175% Year-Over-Year
data.description:
• Comparing the first three weeks of U.S. listed bitcoin ETF inflows sees 2025 outpace 2024 by over 175% year-over-year.
  • Total net inflows for U.S.-listed bitcoin ETFs are $40.6 billion.

data.title: U.S. Spot Bitcoin ETF Inflows Surge Over 160% Year-Over-Year
data.description:
• Comparing the first three weeks of U.S. listed bitcoin ETF inflows sees 2025 outpace 2024 by over 160% year-over-year.
  • Total net inflows for U.S.-listed bitcoin ETFs are $40.6 billion.

data.title: Bullish Global Weighs IPO as Early as This Year Amid Crypto Market Optimism: Bloomberg
data.description:
• Bullish Global is considering an IPO as early as this year, Bloomberg reported.
  • The crypto exchange called off a SPAC listing in 2022.

data.title: XRP Ledger ‘Self-Healed’ After Brief Downtime
data.description:
• The XRP Ledger (XRPL) was briefly unavailable early Wednesday.
  • The incident began when the network's consensus process appeared to function, but validations were not being published, causing the network's ledgers to drift apart.

data.title: Blockstream Opens New Office in Tokyo as It Expands in Asia
data.description:
• Blockstream, the Bitcoin technology firm, has opened a new office in Tokyo as it expands in the region.
  • The crypto firm, co-founded by Adam Back, aims to drive adoption of Bitcoin Layer-2 and self-custody technologies in Japan.

data.title: Equities-Crypto Relationship Is Likely to Weaken in the Long Term, Citi Says
data.description:
• Stocks have been the most important macro driver of crypto, the report said.
  • Citi said the correlation between equities and bitcoin is expected to weaken in the longer term as the adoption of digital assets grows.
  • Crypto regulatory clarity in the U.S. will result in more non-macro driven price action, the bank said.

data.title: Ondo Finance Unveils Looks to Bring Stocks, Bonds and ETFs Onchain, Unveils Tokenization Platform
data.description:
• Ondo Finance introduces Ondo Global Markets (Ondo GM) to tokenize stocks, bonds and ETFs.
  • The new offering can bring institutional-grade financial markets onchain, Ondo said.

data.title: Bitcoin Network Hashrate Growth Was Muted in January: JPMorgan
data.description:
• January was a quiet month for hashrate growth, the report said.
  • The bank noted that mining difficulty fell 2% from the previous month.
  • The total market cap of the 14 publicly-listed miners that JPMorgan follows rose 5% in January.

data.title: Bitcoin Risks Losing the $90K- $110K Range as These 3 Development Could Put the Brakes on the Next Bull Breakout
data.description:
• Key sources of USD liquidity begin to tighten.
  • Trump to evaluate feasibility of strategic BTC reserve.
  • A pattern that marked the previous bull market peak reappears.

data.title: Bitdeer Buys 101 MW Gas Power Plant in Alberta, Canada for BTC Mining
data.description:
• Bitdeer has acquired 101 MW natural glass plant in Alberta for $21.7M.
  • The company plans to use it for BTC mining, with the possibility to expand up to 1 GW.
